title: The Absolute Batman Pre-Flashpoint Collection
description:
Two weeks ago I decided to start reading every single Batman comic from the absolute beginning. Within days I realized just how huge and impossible Batman's history really is, so I opted instead to collect only the essentials starting from the Year One reboot. This isn't just bare-bones - I also included anything that was suggested by knowledgeable bloggers/posters on Batman sites, had good looking artwork, or had a good writer. All copies/scans should be the highest quality available.

002. Batman - Year One
